name: eagerly
content:

B2 in a way that shows that you want to do or have something very much, especially something interesting or enjoyable: When the opportunity to form a new theatre with those artists presented itself, I accepted it eagerly.eagerly awaited His autobiography will be one of the most eagerly awaited books of the season.
